manifestations.name: Warped Betamax Hulks
manifestations.description: Shadowy, lumbering beasts from obsolete Betamax tech, aggressive hunters in flickering corners.
manifestations.behavior: Charge and crush, embody obsolescence rage

manifestations.name: Unraveling Film-Reel Tendrils
manifestations.description: Snaring, strangling appendages with looping static screams, emerging from debris.
manifestations.behavior: Entangle and pull into voids, cause physical restraint

manifestations.name: Audio-Cassette Whispers
manifestations.description: Insidious echoes whispering regrets, driving madness in isolated halls.
manifestations.behavior: Psychological attack, induce paranoia and hesitation

general_notes: All born from forgotten analog media, stronger in Backrooms isolation, tie to themes of digital-era discard.
